Verses: 1 appozhudhu Themaaniyanaagiya Elippaas Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 gnaanavaan Kaatraippondra Nyaayangalai Solli, Than Vayitraik Kondalkaatrinaal Nirappi,
3 prayojanamillaadha Vaarththaigalaalum, Ubayogamillaadha Vasanangalaalum Tharkkikkalaamo?
4 neer Bayabakthiyai Veenendru Solli, Dhevanukku Munbaaga Jebaththiyaanaththaik Kuraiyappannugireer.
5 ummudaiya Vaai Ummudaiya Akkiramaththai Sollikkaattugiradhu; Neer Thandhiramullavargalin Naavaith Therindhukondeer.
6 naan Alla, Ummudaiya Vaaye Ummaik Kutravaali Endru Theerkkiradhu; Ummudaiya Udhadugale Umakku Virodhamaaga Saatchiyidugiradhu.
7 manusharil Mundhip Pirandhavar Neerdhaano? Parvadhangalukkumunne Uruvaakkappatteero?
8 neer Dhevanudaiya Ragasiya Aalosanaiyaik Kettu, Gnaanaththai Ummidamaai Serththukkondeero?
9 naangal Ariyaadha Endhak Kaariyaththai Neer Arindhirukkireer? Engalukku Vilangaadha Endhak Kaariyamaavadhu Umakku Vilangiyirukkiradho?
10 ummudaiya Thagappanaippaarkkilum Periya Vayadhulla Naraiththorum Viruththaappiyarum Engalukkul Irukkiraargale.
11 dhevan Aruliya Aarudhalgalum, Ummode Sollappadugira Mirudhuvaana Pechchum Umakku Arpakaariyamaayirukkiradho?
12 ummudaiya Irudhayam Ummai Enge Kondupogiradhu? Ummudaiya Kangal Neriththuppaarkkiradhu Enna?
13 dhevanukku Virodhamaaga Ummudaiya Aaviyai Ezhuppi, Ummudaiya Vaayilirundhu Vasanangalaip Purappadappannugireer.
14 manushanaanavan Parisuththamaayirukkiradharkum, Sthreeyinidaththil Pirandhavan Needhimaanaayirukkiradharkum, Avan Emmaaththiram?
15 idho, Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalaiyum Avar Nambugiradhillai; Vaanangalum Avar Paarvaikku Suththamaanavaigal Alla.
16 aniyaayaththaith Thanneeraippolak Kudikkira Manushan Eththanai Adhigamaai Aruvaruppum Asuththamumaayirukkiraan?
17 umakkuk Kaariyaththaith Theriyappannuven, Ennaik Kelum; Naan Kandadhai Umakku Vivariththu Solluven.
18 gnaanigal Thangal Pidhaakkal Sollak Kettu Maraikkaamal Ariviththadhaiye Naan Solluven.
19 avargalukkumaaththiram Boomi Alikkappattadhu; Anniyar Avargal Naduve Kadandhupoga Idamillai.
20 dhunmaarkkan Uyirodirukkira Naalellaam Thunpaththaal Vaadhikkappadugiraan; Balavandhampannugiravanukku Avan Varushangalin Thogai Maraikkappattirukkiradhu.
21 bayangaramaana Saththam Avan Kaadhugalil Thonikkiradhu; Avan Samaadhaanamaayirukkaiyil Paazhaakkiravan Avanmel Varuvaan.
22 irulilirundhu Thirumbivara Avanukku Nambikkaiyillaamal, Padhivirukkiravargalin Pattayaththukku Avan Bayappadugiraan.
23 appam Enge Kidaikkum Endru Avan Alaindhu Thirigiraan; Andhagaaranaal Thanakku Sameebiththirukkiradhai Arivaan.
24 ikkattum Nerukkamum Avanaik Kalangappanni, Yuththasannaththanaana Raajaavaippola Avanai Merkollum.
25 avan Dhevanukku Virodhamaagak Kaineetti, Sarvavallavarukku Virodhamaagap Paraakkiramam Paaraattugiraan.
26 kadinakkazhuththodum, Paruththa Kumizhulla Than Kedayangalodum Avarukku Edhiraaga Odugiraan.
27 avan Mugaththaik Kozhuppu Moodiyirukkiradhu; Adivayiru Thondhi Vittirukkiradhu.
28 aanaalum Paazhaana Pattanangalilum, Kudipona Karkuviyalaana Veedugalilum Vaasampannuvaan.
29 avan Aisuvariyavaanaavadhumillai, Avan Aasthi Nilaippadhumillai, Appadippattavargalin Selvam Boomiyil Neediththiruppadhillai.
30 irulukku Avan Thappuvadhillai; Akkinijuvaalai Avanudaiya Kilaiyaik Kaaindhupogappannum; Avarudaiya Vaayin Suvaasaththaal Atruppovaan.
31 vazhithappinavan Maayaiyai Nambaanaaga; Nambinaal Maayaiye Avan Balanaayirukkum.
32 adhu Avan Naal Varumunne Avanukkup Pooranamaaip Palikkum; Avanudaiya Koppup Pachchaikolvadhillai.
33 pinjugal Udhirndhupogira Dhraatchachchediyaippolavum, Pookkal Udhirndhupogira Olivamaraththaippolavum Avan Iruppaan.
34 maayakkaararin Koottam Verumaiyaaip Pom; Paridhaanam Vaanginavargalin Koodaarangalai Akkini Patchikkum.
35 appadippattavan Aniyaayaththaik Karppandhariththu, Akkiramaththaip Perugiraan; Avargal Karppam Maayaiyaip Pirappikkum Endraan.
